ReadOnly.description: Flag indicating if the order is read-only.

OrderItems.description: List of items included in the order.

ReferenceNum.description: Reference number associated with the order.

ExternalId.description: connection of this order to the same order on some other system

EarliestShipDate.description: Earliest date and time the order can be shipped.

ShipCancelDate.description: Date and time the shipment can be canceled.

Notes.description: Any additional notes related to the order.

NumUnits1.description: Number of units of the first type.

NumUnits2.description: Number of units of the second type.

BillingCode.description: Billing code associated with the order.

UpsServiceOptionCharge.description: Charge associated with UPS service options.

AddFreightToCod.description: Whether additional freight charges should be added to Cash on Delivery.

UpsIsResidential.description: Flag indicating if the UPS delivery address is residential.

ExportChannelIdentifier.description: A reference to the channel used to export an Advance Shipping Notice or RoutingRequest; must specify Id (Name alone will fail)

RoutePickupDate.description: Date and time for route pickup.

MasterBillOfLadingId.description: ID of the master bill of lading.

InvoiceNumber.description: Invoice number related to the order.

Billing.description: PUT: set to null to make no changes to billing

ShipTo.description: if not found, creates new shipto contact

SoldTo.description: if not found, creates new soldto contact

BillTo.description: if not found, creates new billto contact

SavedElements.description: Saved elements related to the order.
